title: North Star Knowledge System (Meta-Architecture)
summary: The structural blueprint for the 'Project North Star' knowledge base. Designed for AI consumability, density, and evolutionary iteration.
core_philosophy: AI-First: Assets are written for machine parsing (JSON), not human leisure (Prose).
Density: Maximum information per token. No fluff.
Structure: Strict schema enforcement to enable future automated reasoning and graph linking.

indexing_strategy.future: Graph-based Master Index (linking concepts across files via IDs)

evolution_process.step_3: Refine (Update JSON version on new insights)
